reviews.text: They are located in the back of the 2 Truths bar. The bar itself itself doesn't serve food but the Jerk Joint is nestled in the back corner. Very affordable...
First time I tried Jerk chicken was at Lake Merritt in California and it was fresh off the grill with no bones and it was amazing-thought this experience...
The Jerk Joint was AMAZING!!!! I got the Tacos for Jerks and it was so delicious! The picture shown is the Jerk Joint fries and those were also amazing....
